CustomField.formula: CASE(Stage__c, "Notification Received","Active - Pending Move Out", "Ready to Schedule MOI/Utility Transfer","Active - Pending Move Out", "Move Out Scheduled","Active - Pending Move Out", "Move Out Assigned","Active - Pending Move Out", "GC Awarded","Active - In Process", "Five Day Complete","Active - In Process", "Final Inspection Pass / QC Ready","Active - In Process", "Final Inspection Pass","Active - In Process", "QC Assigned","Active - In Process", "QC Open","Active - In Process", "QC Closed","Active - In Process", "2 Day Walk Complete","Active - In Process", "Closed - Completed","Completed", "Closed - Cancelled","Completed", "Closed - No Rehab Needed","Completed", "Complete","Completed", "HOLD - BK","HOLD - BK/Deed", "HOLD - Deed","HOLD - BK/Deed", "HOLD - Notification Revoked/Cancel Utility Transfer","HOLD - Notification Revoked", "HOLD - Occupied/TIP","HOLD - TIP", "HOLD - Permits","Active - Pre-Construction", "HOLD - Sell","HOLD - Sell", null)
CustomField.label: Rehab Status
